title: Vermouth Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Vermouth Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
2 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
2 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
sweet vermouth
2
dashes
maraschino liqueur
(or curacao or Grand Marnier)
2
dashes
Angostura bitters
1-2
dashes
simple syrup
, to taste
Twist of lemon peel
, for garnish
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well until chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over drink and use as garnish.
Special Equipment
mixing glass, bar spoon, strainer
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
